audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers

name: ZeoEngine Game Engine

screenshots.caption: The engine using the Game class itself as the class to run

short_description:
*I have stopped working on this project*

I have realized how terrible of a language Java is, and have no plans to continue working on this. If you want to continue it, just send me a message. I am currently writing an engine in C++ instead at http://github.com/brpylko/kp.

ZeoEngine is designed to be extremely object-oriented, easy to use, and flexible. It is meant to make creating games easy, but to also give the programmer a wide range of options. All of the low-level things are taken care of - giving the developer lots of time to focus on gameplay, rather than figuring out why this stupid JFrame won't go full screen.
summary: An object-oriented game engine designed to be flexible and easy to use
